title: What is the quality of the Euro relative the currencies of Sweden and Great Britain? - Quora

response.answer_text: Euro is a rather political project and it is an expression of group of states to follow identical/similar economical and political goals. Euro´s advantage is that it enables companies to calculate their European operations in one currency. Although UK and Sweden have their own currencies, they are strongly affected by the very existence of this big single-currency bloc. The single currency also brings positive aspects for citizens. They don´t have to exchange money every time they go abroad.
